title: Sophora compounds against non-small cell lung cancer: Research status and mechanisms.
abstract: Non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) is the most prevalent form of lung cancer, characterized by dysregulated signaling pathways. Many Sophora compounds exhibit potential anti-NSCLC properties. However, the research status, particularly regarding the underlying mechanisms, remains fragmented.
journal: Phytomedicine : international journal of phytotherapy and phytopharmacology
